sqlMap.select: select BASE_GP_CD, BASE_CD, BASE_CD_NM, BASE_API_CD, BASE_USE_ST, BASE_NM_ST, BASE_MOD_ST, BASE_ORDERBY from base_code_cd_tb where 1 and BASE_GP_CD = #base_gp_cd# order by BASE_USE_ST, BASE_CD, BASE_ORDERBY asc
sqlMap.update: update base_code_cd_tb set BASE_CD_NM = #base_cd_nm#, BASE_API_CD = #base_api_cd#, BASE_USE_ST = #base_use_st# where 1 and BASE_CD = #base_cd#
sqlMap.select: select SMS_SEQ, SMS_CD, SMS_USE_USER, SMS_USE_STORE, SMS_USE_CENTER, SMS_CONTENT_USER, SMS_CONTENT_STORE, SMS_CONTENT_CENTER from base_config_sms_content_tb where 1 and SMS_CD = #sms_cd#
sqlMap.update: update base_config_sms_content_tb set SMS_USE_USER = #sms_use_user#, SMS_USE_STORE = #sms_use_store#, SMS_USE_CENTER = #sms_use_center#, SMS_CONTENT_USER = #sms_content_user#, SMS_CONTENT_STORE = #sms_content_store#, SMS_CONTENT_CENTER = #sms_content_center# where 1 and SMS_CD = #sms_cd#
sqlMap.select: select PUSH_SEQ, PUSH_CD, PUSH_USE_USER, PUSH_USE_STORE, PUSH_USE_CENTER, PUSH_CONTENT_USER, PUSH_CONTENT_STORE, PUSH_CONTENT_CENTER from base_config_push_content_tb where 1 and PUSH_CD = #push_cd#
sqlMap.update: update base_config_push_content_tb set PUSH_USE_USER = #push_use_user#, PUSH_USE_STORE = #push_use_store#, PUSH_USE_CENTER = #push_use_center#, PUSH_CONTENT_USER = #push_content_user#, PUSH_CONTENT_STORE = #push_content_store#, PUSH_CONTENT_CENTER = #push_content_center# where 1 and PUSH_CD = #push_cd#
sqlMap.select: select BASE_TG_CD_0_1, BASE_TG_CD_0_2, BASE_TG_CD_0_3, BASE_TG_CD_0_4, BASE_TG_CD_0_5, BASE_TG_CD_0_6, BASE_TG_CD_0_7, BASE_TG_CD_0_8, BASE_TG_CD_0_9, BASE_TG_CD_0_10, BASE_TG_CD_0_11, BASE_TG_CD_0_12, BASE_TG_CD_1_1, BASE_TG_CD_1_2, BASE_TG_CD_1_3, BASE_TG_CD_1_4, BASE_TG_CD_2_1, BASE_TG_CD_2_2, BASE_TG_CD_2_3, BASE_TG_CD_2_4, BASE_TG_CD_3_1, BASE_TG_CD_3_2, BASE_TG_CD_3_3, BASE_TG_CD_3_4, BASE_TG_CD_4_1, BASE_TG_CD_4_2, BASE_TG_CD_4_3, BASE_TG_CD_4_4, BASE_TG_CD_5_1, BASE_TG_CD_5_2, BASE_TG_CD_5_3, BASE_TG_CD_5_4 from base_code_tg_tb where 1 and TG_NM = 1
sqlMap.update: update base_code_tg_tb set BASE_TG_CD_0_1 = #base_tg_cd_0_1#, BASE_TG_CD_0_2 = #base_tg_cd_0_2#, BASE_TG_CD_0_3 = #base_tg_cd_0_3#, BASE_TG_CD_0_4 = #base_tg_cd_0_4#, BASE_TG_CD_0_5 = #base_tg_cd_0_5#, BASE_TG_CD_0_6 = #base_tg_cd_0_6#, BASE_TG_CD_0_7 = #base_tg_cd_0_7#, BASE_TG_CD_0_8 = #base_tg_cd_0_8#, BASE_TG_CD_0_9 = #base_tg_cd_0_9#, BASE_TG_CD_0_10 = #base_tg_cd_0_10#, BASE_TG_CD_0_11 = #base_tg_cd_0_11#, BASE_TG_CD_0_12 = #base_tg_cd_0_12#, BASE_TG_CD_1_1 = #base_tg_cd_1_1#, BASE_TG_CD_1_2 = #base_tg_cd_1_2#, BASE_TG_CD_1_3 = #base_tg_cd_1_3#, BASE_TG_CD_1_4 = #base_tg_cd_1_4#, BASE_TG_CD_2_1 = #base_tg_cd_2_1#, BASE_TG_CD_2_2 = #base_tg_cd_2_2#, BASE_TG_CD_2_3 = #base_tg_cd_2_3#, BASE_TG_CD_2_4 = #base_tg_cd_2_4#, BASE_TG_CD_3_1 = #base_tg_cd_3_1#, BASE_TG_CD_3_2 = #base_tg_cd_3_2#, BASE_TG_CD_3_3 = #base_tg_cd_3_3#, BASE_TG_CD_3_4 = #base_tg_cd_3_4#, BASE_TG_CD_4_1 = #base_tg_cd_4_1#, BASE_TG_CD_4_2 = #base_tg_cd_4_2#, BASE_TG_CD_4_3 = #base_tg_cd_4_3#, BASE_TG_CD_4_4 = #base_tg_cd_4_4#, BASE_TG_CD_5_1 = #base_tg_cd_5_1#, BASE_TG_CD_5_2 = #base_tg_cd_5_2#, BASE_TG_CD_5_3 = #base_tg_cd_5_3#, BASE_TG_CD_5_4 = #base_tg_cd_5_4# where 1 and TG_NM = 1
